revised_title: Queen Elizabeth The Queen Mother's Involvement with the Royal Society
tldr: In 1956, Queen Elizabeth The Queen Mother was elected as a Fellow of the Royal Society. In 1957, she attended an Ordinary Meeting, signing the Obligation in the Charter Book and attending a lecture by Dr. Julian Huxley. This event highlights her connection and support for the Royal Society and the scientific community.
